borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-Material Amendment to Reserved Matters Application (Ref: 2021/02533/RES) dated 14th March 2022, (as amended by Ref: 2023/02126/NMAT, granted 21 March 2024) for the 'Reserved Matters Application relating to the approval of access; appearance; landscaping; layout and scale in respect of Phases 2c and 2d (Development Plots D1 and D2), for the erection of two mixed-use buildings, comprising commercial and residential floorspace with associated landscaping and play space, in compliance with Condition 1 (Reserved Matters Details) and Condition 5 (Design Codes, Development Specification and Parameter Plans) of planning permission (ref: 2018/02100/COMB) granted 8 February 2019 (a comprehensive residential led mixed use redevelopment of the former Gasworks Site).' with amendments sought to Condition 1 (Drawings). Proposed amendments have resulted from a need to provide access to two staircases from each upper level within Plot D1, as a result of current fire safety regulations and guidance. Amendments comprise; Providing access to two independent staircases and two evacuation lifts from Levels 1 to 7 by connecting Cores D1.1 and D1.2 common corridors; Providing access to two independent staircases from Level 8 by providing an additional escape route across the roof with direct access to an extended secondary staircase; Providing access to an additional safe waiting space for disabled occupants within the secondary D1.1 staircase at Level 8.
site_name: Fulham Gas WorksImperial RoadLondon
